readable.title: 2618538137_44fffe10c4
readable.content: A bare chested man with a fierce expression on his face squats on a skateboard beside a furry dog . A brown and white dog is walking next to a man on a skateboard . A man on a skateboard is squatting next to a large dog . A man on a skateboard poses with a dog . A man wearing no shirt rides a skateboard with a brown dog .
